languages.text: "Как странно. Но я не смею ослушаться, шерин. Если вы велите забыть — ветер забвения уносит нежеланные вами воспоминания из моей памяти".
"How strange. But I dare not disobey, shereen. If you command me to forget, the winds of oblivion will carry the memories you scorn from my mind."
languages.original_text: "Как странно. Но я не смею ослушаться, шерин. Если вы велите забыть — ветер забвения уносит нежеланные вами воспоминания из моей памяти".

traits.locale_text: "How strange. But I dare not disobey, shereen. If you command me to forget, the winds of oblivion will carry the memories you scorn from my mind."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "How strange. But I dare not disobey, shereen. If you command me to forget, the winds of oblivion will carry the memories you scorn from my mind."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "How strange. But I dare not disobey, shereen. If you command me to forget, the winds of oblivion will carry the memories you scorn from my mind."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "How strange. But I dare not disobey, shereen. If you command me to forget, the winds of oblivion will carry the memories you scorn from my mind."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Qué curioso. Pero no desobedeceré, shereen. Si me ordena que olvide, los vientos del olvido arrancarán las memorias que quiere borrar de mi mente».
languages.original_text: "How strange. But I dare not disobey, shereen. If you command me to forget, the winds of oblivion will carry the memories you scorn from my mind."

traits.locale_text: «Qué curioso. Pero no desobedeceré, shereen. Si me ordena que olvide, los vientos del olvido arrancarán las memorias que quiere borrar de mi mente».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “真古怪，但我不敢违抗，亲爱的。如果你命令我忘记这些事情，那么遗忘之风会把这些你不愿再提的记忆从我脑海中带走。”
languages.original_text: "How strange. But I dare not disobey, shereen. If you command me to forget, the winds of oblivion will carry the memories you scorn from my mind."

traits.locale_text: “真古怪，但我不敢违抗，亲爱的。如果你命令我忘记这些事情，那么遗忘之风会把这些你不愿再提的记忆从我脑海中带走。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「おかしいわね。だけどあたしは逆らうつもりはないわ、シャリーン。もしあんたがあたしに忘れるよう命じれば、忘却の風があたしの頭からあんたがあざ笑った記憶をぬぐい去っていくでしょうね」
languages.original_text: "How strange. But I dare not disobey, shereen. If you command me to forget, the winds of oblivion will carry the memories you scorn from my mind."

traits.locale_text: 「おかしいわね。だけどあたしは逆らうつもりはないわ、シャリーン。もしあんたがあたしに忘れるよう命じれば、忘却の風があたしの頭からあんたがあざ笑った記憶をぬぐい去っていくでしょうね」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « C'est étrange, mais je n'ose pas vous désobéir, shereen. Si tel est votre désir, les vents de l'oubli balaieront de mon esprit tous les souvenirs qui ont le malheur de vous déplaire. »
languages.original_text: "How strange. But I dare not disobey, shereen. If you command me to forget, the winds of oblivion will carry the memories you scorn from my mind."

traits.locale_text: « C'est étrange, mais je n'ose pas vous désobéir, shereen. Si tel est votre désir, les vents de l'oubli balaieront de mon esprit tous les souvenirs qui ont le malheur de vous déplaire. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Wie merkwürdig. Doch ich wage es nicht, mich Euch zu widersetzen, Shereen. Wenn Ihr mir zu vergessen befehlt, werden die Winde des Vergessens die Euch so verhassten Erinnerungen aus meinem Verstand wehen."
languages.original_text: "How strange. But I dare not disobey, shereen. If you command me to forget, the winds of oblivion will carry the memories you scorn from my mind."

traits.locale_text: "Wie merkwürdig. Doch ich wage es nicht, mich Euch zu widersetzen, Shereen. Wenn Ihr mir zu vergessen befehlt, werden die Winde des Vergessens die Euch so verhassten Erinnerungen aus meinem Verstand wehen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "How strange. But I dare not disobey, shereen. If you command me to forget, the winds of oblivion will carry the memories you scorn from my mind."

languages.text: "Çok tuhaf. İtaatsizlik etme cüretini gösteremem şirinim. Bana unutmamı emrediyorsan sonsuzluğun rüzgârları, hafızamdaki küçük gördüğün bu anıları alıp götürür."
languages.original_text: "How strange. But I dare not disobey, shereen. If you command me to forget, the winds of oblivion will carry the memories you scorn from my mind."

traits.locale_text: "Çok tuhaf. İtaatsizlik etme cüretini gösteremem ama şirinim. Bana unutmamı emrediyorsan, sonsuzluğun rüzgârları hafızamdaki küçük gördüğün bu anıları alıp götürecektir."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
